definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder

sentences.english: The red lionfish sports maroon and white stripes to complement its venomous spines.
sentences.chinese: 紅獅子魚褐白相間的條紋真是爲它的毒刺錦上添花。

sentences.english: It pierces the canopy but misses Quaritch.
sentences.chinese: 毒刺貫穿了座艙罩，但沒刺到誇裏奇。

sentences.english: Remove the stinger, wet the sting and immediately shake on a paste of salt and water.
sentences.chinese: 取出毒刺，把被叮處弄溼並立即把鹽糊塗在上面。

sentences.english: It is very unusual for a mammal to lay eggs or to have poisonous spurs!
sentences.chinese: 對哺乳動物來說，卵生和長有毒刺是很少見的。

sentences.english: A wheel trailer filled with self-securing stability Stinger continues, and your bike.
sentences.chinese: 阿自鎖輪子塞滿不斷的毒刺拖車穩定，而你的自行車。

sentences.english: Motorcycle trailer bike folding phones from the same one.
sentences.chinese: 阿禿鷹輪塞滿不斷的毒刺拖車穩定，而你的自行車。

sentences.english: Put it on insect bites to take the sting out.
sentences.chinese: 在蟲子叮咬的地方塗一些小蘇打可利於將毒刺取出。

sentences.english: The first step in treating yellow jacket stings is to remove the stinger.
sentences.chinese: 在黃馬褂刺治療第一步是刪除毒刺。

definition: forest or meadow viper (Vipera russelii siamensis or similar)
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
